mapper.select: SELECT id, parent_id AS parentId, name, code, subject_name AS subjectName, subject_code AS subjectCode, count FROM question_knowledge_point ORDER BY code, name
SELECT id, parent_id AS parentId, name, code, subject_name AS subjectName, subject_code AS subjectCode, count FROM question_knowledge_point WHERE parent_id=#{parentId} ORDER BY code, name
SELECT id, parent_id AS parentId, name, code, subject_name AS subjectName, subject_code AS subjectCode, count FROM question_knowledge_point WHERE subject_code=#{subjectCode} ORDER BY code, name
SELECT CONCAT(subject_code, '-', original_id) FROM question WHERE is_marked=1
SELECT COUNT(id) AS count FROM question WHERE knowledge_point_id=#{knowledgePointId}
mapper.update: UPDATE question SET is_marked=IF(is_marked=0, 1, 0) WHERE id=#{questionId}
UPDATE question_knowledge_point qkp JOIN (SELECT knowledge_point_id AS id, COUNT(id) AS count FROM question GROUP BY knowledge_point_id) AS t ON qkp.id=t.id SET qkp.count=t.count
